column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place gets super packed!!! Therefore
column2: I suggest making reservations here. It's a good thing I did. After getting past the hectic-ness of the front door
column3: you can appreciate its upbeat ambiance and prompt service. The peach sangria was light but did the trick.....we ended up ordering the following (2 tapas each is plenty of food!!!)
